entry.title: P2 Pentalobe Screwdriver For iPhone
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Accessories
Price: 3.99

Description

Use This precision P2 pentalobe screwdriver to open iPhone and Apple devices. The P2 driver is compatible with the 5-point star shaped pentalobe 5IPR security fasteners used on the bottom of iPhones. The screwdriver is compatible with the security screws on the bottom of all models of iPhone. Color may vary.

entry.title: Repair Pro 54 Bits Toolkit
entry.summary:
Vendor: Chuck
Type: Accessories
Price: 24.99

Description

The Repair Pro ToolKit includes a magnetized driver handle, flexible extensions and 1/4" to 4mm driver adapters. The Repair Pro 54 Bits Toolkit can be used to repair Apple, Android, Google and other mobile devices, consoles or computers. You can use this item when repairing or restoring a device.

Content

  • Nut Driver - 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4, 4.5, 5
  • Hex - 0.7, 0.9, 1, 1.3, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 3.5, 4mm
  • Pentalobe - 0.8, 1.2
  • Square - SQO, SQ1
  • Torx - T3, T4, T5, T6, T7, T8, T9, T10, T15, T20
  • Pozidriv - PZ000, PZ00, PZ0, PZ1, PZ2
  • Flathead - 1, 1.3, 1.5, 2, 2.5, 3, 4mm
  • Phillips - PH000, PH00, PH0, PH1, PH2
  • Tri-Point - 2, 3
  • Triangle - 2, 2.3mm
  • Spanner - 2.6
  • Sim - Sim Eject 

Warranty

Unlockr offers a 1 year on this item. Our warranty does not cover physical damage caused by the technician or any other reason. Please see our full warranty and returns policy for extra details.

Part Type Repair Toolkit
Compatible Model N/A
Model Number N/A
Manufacturer Replacement Parts
Warranty 1 Year Warranty

entry.title: EarPods Headphones With Media Controls
entry.summary:
Vendor: Jerry
Type: Accessories
Price: 6.49 - 15.99 (2 variants)

The EarPods include a built-in remote that lets you adjust the volume, control the playback of your music and videos, and allows you to answer or end calls. The speakers inside offer maximum sound output to quality ratio and minimise lound loss to offer the hiest quality audio on earbuds. Their design is defined by the geometry of the ear which makes them comfortable to more people than any other earbuds.

Warranty

The Headphones come with a 1 year warranty, as the other Accessories. 

Part Type Accessories
Warranty 1 Year Warranty
